verses.text: Moreover, when ye shall \w divide|strong="H5307"\w* by lot the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* for \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, ye shall \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* an \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, an holy \w portion|strong="H6944"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add reeds\add*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \add shall be\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*. This \add shall be\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* in all the \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.\f + \fr 45.1 \ft when…: Heb. when ye cause the land to fall\f*\f + \fr 45.1 \ft an holy…: Heb. holiness\f*

Of this there shall be for the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add in length\add*, with \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add in breadth\add*, \w square|strong="H7251"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*; and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* for the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 45.2 \ft suburbs: or, void places\f*

And of this \w measure|strong="H4060"\w* shalt thou \w measure|strong="H4058"\w* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*: and in it shall be the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \add and\add* the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*.

The \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add portion\add* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, which shall come \w near|strong="H7131"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and it shall be a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* for their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and an holy \w place|strong="H4720"\w* for the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*.

And the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* of \w length|strong="H0753"\w*, and the \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* of \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, shall also the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, the \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, have for themselves, for a \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* for \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*.

¶ And ye shall \w appoint|strong="H5414"\w* the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add portion:\add* it shall be for the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And a \add portion shall be\add* for the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* on the one side and on the other side of the \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add portion\add*, and of the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add portion\add*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, from the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*, and from the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6921"\w*: and the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \add shall be\add* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w portions|strong="H2506"\w*, from the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* unto the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.

In the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and my \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* shall no more \w oppress|strong="H3238"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and \add the rest of\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall they \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* according to their \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Let it \w suffice|strong="H7227"\w* you, O \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* and \w spoil|strong="H7701"\w*, and \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*, take \w away|strong="H7311"\w* your \w exactions|strong="H1646"\w* from my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.  +  r 45.9  t exactions: Heb. expulsions *
Ye shall have \w just|strong="H6664"\w* \w balances|strong="H3976"\w*, and a \w just|strong="H6664"\w* \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*, and a \w just|strong="H6664"\w* \w bath|strong="H1324"\w*.

The \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* and the \w bath|strong="H1324"\w* shall be of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w measure|strong="H8506"\w*, that the \w bath|strong="H1324"\w* may \w contain|strong="H5375"\w* the tenth \w part|strong="H4643"\w* of an \w homer|strong="H2563"\w*, and the \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* the tenth \w part|strong="H6224"\w* of an \w homer|strong="H2563"\w*: the \w measure|strong="H4971"\w* thereof shall be after the \w homer|strong="H2563"\w*.

And the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* \add shall be\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w gerahs|strong="H1626"\w*: \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, shall be your \w maneh|strong="H4488"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* that ye shall \w offer|strong="H7311"\w*; the sixth \w part|strong="H8345"\w* of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of an \w homer|strong="H2563"\w* of \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, and ye shall give the sixth \w part|strong="H8341"\w* of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of an \w homer|strong="H2563"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*:

Concerning the \w ordinance|strong="H2706"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, the \w bath|strong="H1324"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \add ye shall offer\add* the tenth \w part|strong="H4643"\w* of a \w bath|strong="H1324"\w* out of the \w cor|strong="H3734"\w*, \add which is\add* an \w homer|strong="H2563"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w baths|strong="H1324"\w*; for \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w baths|strong="H1324"\w* \add are\add* an \w homer|strong="H2563"\w*:

And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w* out of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, out of two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, out of the fat \w pastures|strong="H4945"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; for a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and for peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, to make \w reconciliation|strong="H3722"\w* for them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 45.15 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*\f + \fr 45.15 \ft peace…: or, thank offerings\f*

All the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall give this \w oblation|strong="H8641"\w* for the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 45.16 \ft shall…: Heb. shall be for\f*\f + \fr 45.16 \ft for: or, with\f*

And it shall be the \w prince’s part|strong="H5387"\w* \add to give\add* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and meat \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*, and drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*, in the \w feasts|strong="H2282"\w*, and in the new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, and in the \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, in all \w solemnities|strong="H4150"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: he shall \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, to make \w reconciliation|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 45.17 \ft peace…: or, thank offerings\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; In the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, and \w cleanse|strong="H2398"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and upon the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6438"\w* of the \w settle|strong="H5835"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and upon the \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*.

And so thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* for every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* that \w erreth|strong="H7686"\w*, and for \add him that is\add* \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*: so shall ye \w reconcile|strong="H3722"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

In the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, ye shall have the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w*, a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w seven|strong="H7620"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* shall be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*.

And upon that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* for himself and for all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* he shall \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; and a \w kid|strong="H8163"\w* of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \add for\add* a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And he shall \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* for a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* for a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*.

In the \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, shall he \w do|strong="H6213"\w* the like in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of the \w seven|strong="H7637"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, according to the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, according to the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and according to the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and according to the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.
